state.note: In the current wiki entry, the position is labeled as SY

This party is not the same as the Patriot of Ukraine. They don't have a page in Wikipedia. https://www.unian.ua/elections/10607316-politichni-sili-ukrajini-partiya-patriot.html?_gl=1*3q26jd*_ga*MTU1MDUyMDkzOC4xNjkzNTUyNzcx*_ga_TECJ2YKWSJ*MTY5MzU1MzAzMy4xLjAuMTY5MzU1MzAzMy42MC4wLjA.*_ga_DENC12J6P3*MTY5MzU1MzAzMy4xLjAuMTY5MzU1MzAzMy42MC4wLjA.; https://uk.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%93%D0%BE%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%BC%D1%88%D0%B0_%D0%9C%D0%B8%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%BB%D0%B0_%D0%AF%D1%80%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%B0%D0%B2%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%87; https://www.chesno.org/party/138/

The uk.wiki does not indicate the party's political orientation. In fact, it is a political project of the regional elites in Khmelnytska Oblast )_(https://uk.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%97%D0%B0_%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%BA%D1%80%D0%B5%D1%82%D0%BD%D1%96_%D1%81%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B2%D0%B8).

Syncretic politics which combine elements from across the conventional left–right political spectrum. In this case: fiscal political position = CL, social political position = R
